text: Ettore Scola (10 May 1931 - 19 January 2016) was an Italian screenwriter and movie director. He was known for his movies A Special Day (1977), That Night In Varennes (1982), What Time Is It? (1989) and Captain Fracassa's Journey (1990). Scola died at a hospital in Rome, Italy from pneumonia on 19 January 2016 at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Writers from Campania
title: Ettore Scola
